name: Flip Out (TeamThree110)
description:
Made for GMTK 2020 game jam. Topic: Out of control  

A platformer where you out of control with your character.You can't move or jump or run directly. But you can rotate the level in a clockwise or counterclockwise motion to make your character rolling on the floor or bouncing in the air.

The game's main mechanic is the physics.

Play with keyboard.

  • Controls

Lfet arrow / A - counterclockwise rotate the level

Right arrow / D - clockwise rotate the level

  • Goal of the game

Keep alive

Reach the Flag
